operation.name: insert
operation.sqlmap: insert into form_change_record(record_id,apply_form_id,tab_index,tab_desc,exe_url,form_desc,form_data,original_form_data,page_content,original_page_content,user_id,user_account,user_name,user_ip,dept_id,dept_name,session_id,access_token,status,exe_result,raw_add_time) values (#recordId#, #applyFormId#, #tabIndex#, #tabDesc#, #exeUrl#, #formDesc#, #formData#, #originalFormData#, #pageContent#, #originalPageContent#, #userId#, #userAccount#, #userName#, #userIp#, #deptId#, #deptName#, #sessionId#, #accessToken#, #status#, #exeResult#, #rawAddTime#) <selectKey resultClass ="long" keyProperty ="recordId" > SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID </selectKey>

operation.name: updateNewData
operation.sql: UPDATE form_change_record SET form_data=?,page_content=? WHERE record_id=?

operation.name: updateAccessToken
operation.sql: UPDATE form_change_record SET access_token=? WHERE record_id=?

operation.name: updateStatus
operation.sql: UPDATE form_change_record SET status=? where apply_form_id=?

operation.name: updateExeStatus
operation.sql: UPDATE form_change_record SET status=?,exe_result=? where record_id=?

operation.name: findByCondition
operation.sqlmap: SELECT * from form_change_record where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="formChangeRecord.recordId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> record_id = #formChangeRecord.recordId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="formChangeRecord.userId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> user_id = #formChangeRecord.userId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="formChangeRecord.applyFormId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_form_id = #formChangeRecord.applyFormId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="formChangeRecord.tabIndex" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> tab_index = #formChangeRecord.tabIndex# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="formChangeRecord.sessionId" prepend=" and "> session_id = #formChangeRecord.sessionId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="formChangeRecord.status" prepend=" and "> status = #formChangeRecord.status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="statusList" prepend=" and "> status in <iterate property="statusList" open="(" close=")" conjunction=","> #statusList[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="sortCol" prepend=" order by "> $sortCol$ <isNotEmpty property="sortOrder"> $sortOrder$ </isNotEmpty> </isNotEmpty> LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#;

operation.name: findByConditionCount
operation.sqlmap: SELECT count(*) FROM form_change_record where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="formChangeRecord.recordId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> record_id = #formChangeRecord.recordId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="formChangeRecord.userId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> user_id = #formChangeRecord.userId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="formChangeRecord.applyFormId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_form_id = #formChangeRecord.applyFormId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="formChangeRecord.tabIndex" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> tab_index = #formChangeRecord.tabIndex# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="formChangeRecord.sessionId" prepend=" and "> session_id = #formChangeRecord.sessionId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="formChangeRecord.status" prepend=" and "> status = #formChangeRecord.status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="statusList" prepend=" and "> status in <iterate property="statusList" open="(" close=")" conjunction=","> #statusList[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
